orig_text:
The format of the SSH_MSG_KEXECDH_REPLY is:

      byte      SSH_MSG_KEXECDH_REPLY
correct_text:
The format of the SSH_MSG_KEXECDH_REPLY is:

      byte      SSH_MSG_KEXDH_REPLY
notes: SSH_MSG_KEXECDH_REPLY is defined nowhere. Similar to SSH_MSG_KEXECDH_INIT with SSH_MSG_KEXDH_INIT, I think SSH_MSG_KEXECDH_REPLY is supposed to reuse SSH_MSG_KEXDH_REPLY.
